00002 *
00003 * example_with_simple_remote_control:
00004 *    C++ example using DTrackSDK with simple DTrack/DTrack2 remote control

00019 * Foundation, Inc., 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA  02111-1307  USA
00020 *
00021 *
00022 * Purpose:
00023 *  - example with DTrack/DTrack2 remote commands:
00024 *    starts measurement, collects frames and stops measurement again
00025 *  - using DTrackSDK v2.2.0
00026 *  - tested under Linux (gcc) and MS Windows 2000/XP (MS Visual C++)
00027 *
00028 * $Id: example_with_simple_remote_control.cpp,v 1.6 2012/01/19 10:36:57 christoph Exp $

00030 #include "DTrackSDK.hpp"
00031 
00032 #include <iostream>
00033 #include <sstream>
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 // global DTrackSDK
00038 static DTrackSDK* dt = NULL;
00039 
00040 
00044 static void output_to_console()
00045 {
00046         cout.precision(3);
00047         cout.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
00048 
00049         cout << endl << "frame " << dt->getFrameCounter() << " ts " << dt->getTimeStamp()
00050                 << " nbod " << dt->getNumBody() << " nfly " << dt->getNumFlyStick()
00051                 << " nmea " << dt->getNumMeaTool() << " nmearef " << dt->getNumMeaRef() 
00052                 << " nhand " << dt->getNumHand() << " nmar " << dt->getNumMarker() 
00053                 << " nhuman " << dt->getNumHuman() 
00054                 << endl;
00055 
00056         // bodies:
00057         DTrack_Body_Type_d body;
00058         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumBody(); i++){
00059                 body = *dt->getBody(i);
00060 
00061                 if(body.quality < 0){
00062                         cout << "bod " << body.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00063                 }else{
00064                         cout << "bod " << body.id << " qu " << body.quality
00065                                 << " loc " << body.loc[0] << " " << body.loc[1] << " " << body.loc[2]
00066                         << " rot " << body.rot[0] << " " << body.rot[1] << " " << body.rot[2]
00067                         << " " << body.rot[3] << " " << body.rot[4] << " " << body.rot[5]
00068                         << " " << body.rot[6] << " " << body.rot[7] << " " << body.rot[8] << endl;
00069                 }
00070         }
00071 
00072         // A.R.T. Flysticks:
00073         DTrack_FlyStick_Type_d flystick;
00074         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumFlyStick(); i++){
00075                 flystick = *dt->getFlyStick(i);
00076 
00077                 if(flystick.quality < 0){
00078                         cout << "fly " << flystick.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00079                 }else{
00080                         cout << "flystick " << flystick.id << " qu " << flystick.quality
00081                                 << " loc " << flystick.loc[0] << " " << flystick.loc[1] << " " << flystick.loc[2]
00082                         << " rot " << flystick.rot[0] << " " << flystick.rot[1] << " " << flystick.rot[2]
00083                         << " " << flystick.rot[3] << " " << flystick.rot[4] << " " << flystick.rot[5]
00084                         << " " << flystick.rot[6] << " " << flystick.rot[7] << " " << flystick.rot[8] << endl;
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 cout << "      btn";
00088                 for(int j=0; j<flystick.num_button; j++){
00089                         cout << " " << flystick.button[j];
00090                 }
00091 
00092                 cout << " joy";
00093                 for(int j=0; j<flystick.num_joystick; j++){
00094                         cout << " " << flystick.joystick[j];
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 cout << endl;
00098         }
00099 
00100         // measurement tools:
00101         DTrack_MeaTool_Type_d meatool;
00102         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumMeaTool(); i++){
00103                 meatool = *dt->getMeaTool(i);
00104 
00105                 if(meatool.quality < 0){
00106                         cout << "mea " << meatool.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00107                 }else{
00108                         cout << "mea " << meatool.id << " qu " << meatool.quality
00109                                 << " loc " << meatool.loc[0] << " " << meatool.loc[1] << " " << meatool.loc[2]
00110                         << " rot " << meatool.rot[0] << " " << meatool.rot[1] << " " << meatool.rot[2]
00111                         << " " << meatool.rot[3] << " " << meatool.rot[4] << " " << meatool.rot[5]
00112                         << " " << meatool.rot[6] << " " << meatool.rot[7] << " " << meatool.rot[8] << endl;
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 if (meatool.num_button) {
00116                         cout << "      btn";
00117                         for(int j=0; j<meatool.num_button; j++){
00118                                 cout << " " << meatool.button[j];
00119                         }
00120                         cout << endl;
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 
00124         // measurement references:
00125         DTrack_MeaRef_Type_d mearef;
00126         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumMeaRef(); i++){
00127                 mearef = *dt->getMeaRef(i);
00128 
00129                 if(mearef.quality < 0){
00130                         cout << "mearef " << mearef.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00131                 }else{
00132                         cout << "mearef " << mearef.id << " qu " << mearef.quality
00133                                 << " loc " << mearef.loc[0] << " " << mearef.loc[1] << " " << mearef.loc[2]
00134                         << " rot " << mearef.rot[0] << " " << mearef.rot[1] << " " << mearef.rot[2]
00135                         << " " << mearef.rot[3] << " " << mearef.rot[4] << " " << mearef.rot[5]
00136                         << " " << mearef.rot[6] << " " << mearef.rot[7] << " " << mearef.rot[8] << endl;
00137                 }
00138         }
00139 
00140         // markers:
00141         DTrack_Marker_Type_d marker;
00142         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumMarker(); i++){
00143                 marker = *dt->getMarker(i);
00144 
00145                 cout << "mar " << marker.id << " qu " << marker.quality
00146                         << " loc " << marker.loc[0] << " " << marker.loc[1] << " " << marker.loc[2] << endl;
00147         }
00148 
00149         // A.R.T. Fingertracking hands:
00150         DTrack_Hand_Type_d hand;
00151         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumHand(); i++){
00152                 hand = *dt->getHand(i);
00153 
00154                 if(hand.quality < 0){
00155                         cout << "hand " << hand.id << " not tracked" << endl;
00156                 }else{
00157                         cout << "hand " << hand.id << " qu " << hand.quality
00158                                 << " lr " << ((hand.lr == 0) ? "left" : "right") << " nf " << hand.nfinger
00159                                 << " loc " << hand.loc[0] << " " << hand.loc[1] << " " << hand.loc[2]
00160                         << " rot " << hand.rot[0] << " " << hand.rot[1] << " " << hand.rot[2]
00161                         << " " << hand.rot[3] << " " << hand.rot[4] << " " << hand.rot[5]
00162                         << " " << hand.rot[6] << " " << hand.rot[7] << " " << hand.rot[8] << endl;
00163 
00164                         for(int j=0; j<hand.nfinger; j++){
00165                                 cout << "       fi " << j
00166                                         << " loc " << hand.finger[j].loc[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].loc[1] << " " << hand.finger[j].loc[2]
00167                                 << " rot " << hand.finger[j].rot[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[1] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[2]
00168                                 << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[3] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[4] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[5]
00169                                 << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[6] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[7] << " " << hand.finger[j].rot[8] << endl;
00170                                 cout << "       fi " << j
00171                                         << " tip " << hand.finger[j].radiustip
00172                                         << " pha " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[1]
00173                                 << " " << hand.finger[j].lengthphalanx[2]
00174                                 << " ang " << hand.finger[j].anglephalanx[0] << " " << hand.finger[j].anglephalanx[1] << endl;
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 
00179         // A.R.T human model (6dj)
00180         DTrack_Human_Type human;
00181 
00182         if (dt->getNumHuman() < 1) {
00183                 cout << "no human model data" << endl;
00184         }
00185 
00186         for(int i=0; i<dt->getNumHuman(); i++){
00187                 human = *dt->getHuman(i);
00188                 cout << "human " << human.id << " num joints " << human.num_joints << endl;
00189                 for (int j=0; j<human.num_joints; j++){
00190                         if(human.joint[j].quality<0){
00191                                 cout << "joint " << human.joint[j].id << " not tracked" << endl;
00192                         }else{
00193                                 cout << "joint " << human.joint[j].id << " qu " << human.joint[j].quality
00194                                         << " loc "  << human.joint[j].loc[0] << " " << human.joint[j].loc[1] << " " << human.joint[j].loc[2]
00195                                 << " ang "  << human.joint[j].ang[0] << " " << human.joint[j].ang[1] << " " << human.joint[j].ang[2]
00196                                 << " rot "  << human.joint[j].rot[0] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[1] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[2]
00197                                 << " "      << human.joint[j].rot[3] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[4] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[5]
00198                                 << " "      << human.joint[j].rot[6] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[7] << " " << human.joint[j].rot[8]
00199                                 << endl;
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202                 cout << endl;
00203         }
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00212 static bool data_error_to_console()
00213 {
00214         if (dt->getLastDataError() == DTrackSDK::ERR_TIMEOUT) {
00215                 cout << "--- timeout while waiting for tracking data" << endl;
00216                 return false;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if (dt->getLastDataError() == DTrackSDK::ERR_NET) {
00220                 cout << "--- error while receiving tracking data" << endl;
00221                 return false;
00222         }
00223 
00224         if (dt->getLastDataError() == DTrackSDK::ERR_PARSE){
00225                 cout << "--- error while parsing tracking data" << endl;
00226                 return false;
00227         }
00228 
00229         return true;
00230 }
00231 
00232 
00236 static void messages_to_console()
00237 {
00238         while(dt->getMessage()){
00239                 cout << "ATC message: \"" << dt->getMessageStatus() << "\" \"" << dt->getMessageMsg() << "\"" << endl;
00240         }
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00247 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00248 {
00249         if (argc != 4) {
00250                 cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " <server host> <server port> <data port>" << endl;
00251                 return -1;
00252         }
00253 
00254         int port = 0, rport = 0;
00255         istringstream portstream(argv[2]);
00256         portstream >> rport;  // remote port
00257         if(portstream.fail() || rport <=0 || rport >= 65536){
00258                 cout << "invalid remote port '" << argv[3] << "'" << endl;
00259                 return -2;
00260         }
00261 
00262         portstream.clear();
00263         portstream.str(argv[3]);
00264         portstream >> port;  // data port
00265         if(portstream.fail() || port <=0 || port >= 65536){
00266                 cout << "invalid port '" << argv[2] << "'" << endl;
00267                 return -2;
00268         }
00269 
00270         // init library:
00271         dt = new DTrackSDK((const char *)argv[1], rport, port);
00272 
00273         if(!dt->isLocalDataPortValid()){
00274                 cout << "DTrackSDK init error" << endl;
00275                 return -3;
00276         }
00277 
00278         cout << "connected to ATC '" << argv[1] <<"' (local data port " << dt->getDataPort() << ")" << endl;
00279 
00280         // start measurement:
00281         if (!dt->startMeasurement()) {
00282                 cout << "Start measurement failed!" << endl;
00283                 messages_to_console();
00284                 delete dt;
00285                 return -4;
00286         }
00287 
00288         // receiving:
00289         int loop_count = 0;
00290         while(loop_count++ < 100){
00291 
00292                 if(dt->receive()){
00293                         output_to_console();
00294                 } else {
00295                         data_error_to_console();
00296                 }
00297                 messages_to_console();
00298 
00299         }
00300 
00301         // stop measurement & clean up:
00302         dt->stopMeasurement();
00303         messages_to_console();
00304         delete dt;
00305 
00306         return 0;
00307 }
